creator: jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
text:
The resson is that the file cocoon.xconf.ant_patch which is created by the
xpatch in src/targets/publets-build.xml does not overwrite cocoon.xconf.
Therefore the components as defined in publets.xconf are not included into
cocoon.xconf. 
However this does not happen on the MAC OS-X. This might be a (SuSE) Linux problem. 
The problem can be solved by changing rc/targets/webapp-build.xml as follows:

Index: webapp-build.xml
===================================================================
--- webapp-build.xml    (revision 202559)
+++ webapp-build.xml    (working copy)
@@ -146,7 +146,8 @@
   <target name="copy-cocoon.xconf" if="cocoon.xconf.copy">
     <copy
        file="${build.webapp}/WEB-INF/cocoon.xconf.ant_patch"
-       toFile="${build.webapp}/WEB-INF/cocoon.xconf"/>
+       toFile="${build.webapp}/WEB-INF/cocoon.xconf"
+       overwrite="true"/>
   </target>

   <!--

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
src/targets/publets-build.xml does not exist anymore.
does this problem still persist? if not, please close.
